title: Graspop Metal Meeting 2008 Running Order Preview
description:
Graspop Metal Meeting 2008 Preview
----------------------------------

Preview of the running order of the Graspop Metal Meeting which takes place at Dessel, Belgium on the 27-29th of June 2008.

For all bands performing at Graspop 2008 I included one album, roughly one of the following:

- A greatest hits album
- The most popular album based on available torrent seeds
- Whatever I could find for more obscure bands

All albums are tagged and include cover art. A few bands do not have a full album out or are simply not popular enough for anyone to have put it on the net, I&#039;m sure you can find their crappy myspace homepages yourself:

- Action in DC
- After All
- Dedicted
- Damn Your Idols
- Steak Number Eight

This should offer a nice preview for visitors who want to check out some of the bands in advance of the festival.

Check out the Graspop website at http://www.graspop.be !

Complete list of included albums:
